summary: A very simple tutorial that covers what you need to know when creating NMM installers. No experience is needed, everything is explained.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]NMM Installer Tutorial[/size][/center]

A very simple tutorial that covers what you need to know when creating NMM installers. No experience is needed, everything is explained. This tutorial covers some of the areas that older and outdated NMM Install Tutorials failed to mention.  With the control questions and the sample rar files you are guaranteed to get a better understanding of how to create awesome NMM Installers!

[center][size=5]How to change the .rar file![/size]
[/center]When you are editing the ModuleConfig.xml files and want to see if your changes are correct you must add the FOmod folder to a new rar file and import it to NMM. Thats all that is to it !
author: Adrianus92
